name: Thank You Iwata
description:
"On my business card, I am a corporate president. In my mind, I am a game developer. But in my heart, I am a gamer."

After reading this I realized that I have been stuck in a cumbersome project for quite a while. As a little tribute to Satoru Iwata I have taken 3 days off and do what I like most; prototype little games.

There is not a lot to do in the game, making this game was mainly for myself, to play around and have some fun.

There is a simple little editor in the game so you can create your own playable tribute to Satoru Iwata. (press 1 to toggle the editor, or click the button in the upper-right corner).

You can export a piece of text that others can import in their game, so you can show off your level to others :)
